Introduction Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma PAAD is the third most common cause of death from cancer with an overall 5 year survival rate of less than 5 and is predicted to become the second leading cause of cancer mortality in the United States by 2030 Here we re trying to understand the gene expression distribution for all samples and what the analysis say about the general behaviour of different samples.
